001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.SimpleHolder;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances.DistanceMetric;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
011
012import java.util.Comparator;
013import java.util.Set;
014import java.util.TreeSet;
015
016public class NearestNeighbors implements TrainableFunction<Float> {
017
018    private final DistanceMetric distanceMetric;
019    private final NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting;
020    private DataSet<Float> memory;
021    private int k;
022
023    public NearestNeighbors(int k, DistanceMetric distanceMetric, NeighborWeighting neighborWeighting) {
024        this.distanceMetric = distanceMetric;
025        this.neighborWeighting = neighborWeighting;
026        this.k = k;
027    }
028
029    public DataSet<Float> getMemory() {
030        return memory;
031    }
032
033    public void setMemory(DataSet<Float> memory) {
034        this.memory = memory;
035    }
036
037    public int getK() {
038        return k;
039    }
040
041    public void setK(int k) {
042        if (k <= 0) {
043            throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be positive!");
044        }
045        this.k = k;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public Array<Float> estimate(Array<Float> inputs) {
050        if (k < 0) {
051            throw new IllegalStateException("Invalid k set (" + k + ")! Must be positive!");
052        }
053        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
054            throw new IllegalStateException("Model has not been trained!");
055        }
056        if (k > memory.size()) {
057            throw new IllegalArgumentException("We have not enough samples!");
058        }
059        float maxDistance = Float.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
060        Set<Pair<DataSet.Sample<Float>, Float>> neighbors = new TreeSet<>(furthestFirst());
061        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : memory) {
062            float sampleDistance = distanceMetric.distance(sample.features(), inputs);
063            if (neighbors.size() < k) {
064                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
065                if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
066                    maxDistance = sampleDistance;
067                }
068            } else if (sampleDistance < maxDistance) {
069                neighbors.remove(neighbors.iterator().next());
070                neighbors.add(Pair.of(sample, sampleDistance));
071                maxDistance = sampleDistance;
072            }
073        }
074        SimpleHolder<Float> totalWeights = new SimpleHolder<>(0.0f);
075        Array<Float> estimation = getNumberTypeSupport().createArray(neighbors.iterator().next().left().targetOutputs().length());
076        neighbors.forEach(p -> {
077            float distance = p.right();
078            float weight = neighborWeighting.weight(distance);
079            Array<Float> neighborOutputs = p.left().targetOutputs();
080            totalWeights.adjust(f -> f + weight);
081            for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length(); i++) {
082                estimation.set(i, estimation.get(i) + weight * neighborOutputs.get(i));
083            }
084        });
085        for (int i = 0; i < estimation.length(); i++) {
086            estimation.set(i, estimation.get(i) / totalWeights.get());
087        }
088        return estimation;
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public int arity() {
093        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
094            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
095        }
096        return memory.getFeatureCount();
097    }
098
099    @Override
100    public int coArity() {
101        if (memory == null || memory.isEmpty()) {
102            throw new IllegalStateException("Not trained!");
103        }
104        return memory.getTargetCount();
105    }
106
107    private Comparator<? super Pair<DataSet.Sample<Float>, Float>> furthestFirst() {
108        return (p1, p2) ->
109                Floats.equals(p1.right(), p2.right())
110                        ? 0
111                        : Floats.greaterThan(p1.right(), p2.right())
112                        ? -1
113                        : 1;
114    }
115
116    @Override
117    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> getNumberTypeSupport() {
118        return JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT;
119    }
120
121    @Override
122    public int getParameterCount() {
123        return 0;
124    }
125
126    @Override
127    public Array<Float> getParameters() {
128        return Array.empty();
129    }
130
131    @Override
132    public Float getParameter(int p) {
133        return 0f;
134    }
135
136    @Override
137    public void setParameters(Array<Float> values) {
138    }
139
140    @Override
141    public void setParameter(int p, Float value) {
142    }
143}
